changeSet.author: John Barnard
changeSet.comment: Populate new columns from nested "statementData" JSON
changeSet.sql: UPDATE generations SET "businessName" = "statementData"->>'businessName', frn = ("statementData"->>'frn')::BIGINT, sbi = ("statementData"->>'sbi')::INTEGER, "addressLine1" = "statementData"->'address'->>'line1', "addressLine2" = "statementData"->'address'->>'line2', "addressLine3" = "statementData"->'address'->>'line3', "addressLine4" = "statementData"->'address'->>'line4', "addressLine5" = "statementData"->'address'->>'line5', postcode = "statementData"->'address'->>'postcode', email = "statementData"->>'email', "schemeName" = "statementData"->'scheme'->>'name', "schemeShortName" = "statementData"->'scheme'->>'shortName', "schemeYear" = "statementData"->'scheme'->>'year', "schemeFrequency" = "statementData"->'scheme'->>'frequency' WHERE "statementData" IS NOT NULL;
